The current state indicates that my avatar is positioned at (8, 6) on the map, and there are several potential actions available based on the surroundings. Given my last position is the same, it indicates that my previous action did not result in movement. 

In examining the surroundings:
- To the left (8, 5) is a floor (.), 
- To the right (8, 7) is also a floor (.), 
- Up (7, 6) is also a floor (.), 
- Down (9, 6) is a wall (g). 

Since all directions won't move me other than to left, right, or up, it may be beneficial to explore those options while ensuring I don't step into any hazards.

I will first proceed to move left (to (8, 5)), as it's always good to first test the simple moves towards solving the puzzle. 
``` Action:1 ```

This action will help determine if there’s any potential interaction with nearby boxes or walls once I step into that space.
